s.text: The Health Metrics Network (HMN) is a global collaboration focused on strengthening country health information systems to generate sound data for decision-making at country and global levels (see http://www.who.int/healthmetrics/en/).
The Equity Working Group recommended that target dates be developed with countries to define and integrate core equity indicators into routine information sources.
The Equity Working Group recommended that target dates be developed with countries to define and integrate core equity indicators into routine information sources.

Consequently, the Equity Working Group recommended that health information systems should include the information necessary to create equity indicators, and that research into methodologies should be given due attention.
The Equity Working Group recommended that target dates be developed with countries to define and integrate core equity indicators into routine information sources.
The Equity Working Group recommended that target dates be developed with countries to define and integrate core equity indicators into routine information sources.
If information is disaggregated for very small populations, such as within a village, particular individuals or households may be identifiable and feel their privacy rights were impinged upon.
In other words, the means necessary to achieve health are part and parcel of a right to health.
